subject: Standard Operating Procedure (SOP): Foundation Stone Laying/Inauguration of National Highways projects by Honâ€™ble Prime Minister-reg.
text: 9Rdy 754 rTHRf qiferabrut (Te; 4Rde7 &r rHrf TAT, HRTt TAFR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) 8744 TR 4-5 & 6, 7727-10, E1qT, 7 farrlt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TH4/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAVPolicy Guidelines/ Events/2023 Policy Circular No. 4.28/ 2023 dated O5th April, 2023 {Decision taken on E-Office File No: NHAI/BM/2023-24/ (Comp. No. 198168)} Sub:: Standard Operating Procedure (SOP): Foundation Stone Laying/lnauguration of National Highways projects by Hon'ble Prime Minister- reg: National Highways Authority of India has always been a fore runner in nation building: In the recent past, there has been a spat in planning, developing and completion of National Expressways (NE) and Highways (NH) in India. NEs and NHs one of the core infra-structures for any country to develop and therefore, Govt of the project the same to the nation its achievements. 2 In the recent past, there has been number of events wherein Hon'ble Prime Minister has laid foundation stone, inaugurated and dedicated the NEs and NHs to the nation. During organising such functions, it has been noticed that there were certain procedures which needed standardisation and hence there was a need to draw a SOP for the same Accordingly, SoP for organizing such events has been  prepared and is enclosed herewith for  compliance by all concerned_ 3 . This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. osow/23 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1. Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi. 2. Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3 . Web Admin for circulation. JaI] NHAI being key day, Copy
